column1: 1. Beginning with 1990, reflects the reclassification of employees of Indian tribal governments from the private sector to state and local government.
2. Reflects the reclassification of air couriers from trucking and warehousing to transportation by air.
3. Consists of museums, botanical and zoological gardens; engineering and management services; and services, not elsewhere classified.
Note. Estimates in this table are based on the 1987 Standard Industrial Classification (SIC).
